title: [SKIN CONCEPTS] 5 New Star Guardians - Jhin, Irelia, Tristana, Zoe, Taliyah!
body:
So I'd never designed skins before, but I decided to a while back because I love star guardian skins so much. I had a blast doing these, hopefully y'all like them!
I see Irelia as the leader since she's kind of a freedom fighter in her lore.

https://i.imgur.com/OZMcTdi.jpg
https://i.imgur.com/GIEo0TZ.jpg
https://i.imgur.com/H3GIn7V.jpg
https://i.imgur.com/bKmasVl.jpg
https://i.imgur.com/gGJzji5.jpg

I did a splash for it too ~
https://i.imgur.com/Wptmcl7.jpg

replies.body: Damn, Jhin.
indeed

These all look really good & I wouldn't mind seeing any of them released as real skins.
I definitely like the Colors used for each Guardian, Particularly Tristana's Chartreuse/Teal & Jhin's Rose Red.

**_"Red is a Primary Color_** -Jhin, 2016
"Gold is my power color."

I like it.

I feel like there needs to be more detail in general to reach Riot standards, but these are definitely good ideas.

I do also wonder how males fit in with the whole "Star Guardian" thing, because right now all we have is Ezreal, and everyone still refuses to accept that he's straight.

Doesn't have to reach Riot's standards. This forum is to share concepts and creations for critique to help creators improve, or to just share cool things we made, not to get our creations into the game.
even though it would be nice to have these skins, especially Jhin
star guardian kennen when :-)

> [{quoted}](name=KennensBoyfriend,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AzLYfGGw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-12-23T02:27:00.409+0000)
>
> star guardian kennen when :-)

Never hopefully.

I'm not a big fan of Zoe's design, it's all over the place. They don't change the hair designs completely because the champion has a certain lay out already set for their hitbox. I like the others tho!
Yeah I know realistically it would change her silhouette too much if it was a real skin, but pigtails were such a cute idea I had to go with them anyway {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
It could work if they floated behind her more than hung by her side.

> [{quoted}](name=50CaliberHecate,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AzLYfGGw,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-12-23T03:26:28.278+0000)
>
> I'm not a big fan of Zoe's design, it's all over the place. They don't change the hair designs completely because the champion has a certain lay out already set for their hitbox. I like the others tho!

Zoe's hair isn't part of the hitbox, otherwise her hitbox would be HUGE

As a Zoe main, I love the design you gave her. It's adorable.
Jhin, Tristana, and Taliyah all look great. I'm particularly fond of Tristana's familiar being an Explosive Charge with wings.
Irelia looks very pretty. Well done on that. She's a strong contender for my favorite, and given how much I love Zoe and Tristana, that's an accomplishment.

I do have one suggestion, though: I feel like Zoe's familiars _not_ matching her heterochromatic eyes here is a missed opportunity. You took the step to give her two differently colored familiars, and one of them even seems to match one of her eyes. Why not take that extra step?
Ohhhh I can't believe I didn't think of that! Yeah I'm gonna go back and make one of them blue, thank you ~

> [{quoted}](name=Jhins Girlfriend,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AzLYfGGw,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2018-12-23T11:02:22.693+0000)
>
> Ohhhh I can't believe I didn't think of that! Yeah I'm gonna go back and make one of them blue, thank you ~

I took a look at your tumblr, and now I can feel comfortable saying that Zoe's design reminded me of Pinkie Pie. The pink, curly hair; the bow on the back of her outfit; the way her dress looks like icing on a cake. Her eyes even feel like the right shade of pink and blue. This actually works thematically because minions carry balloons when they have Spell Shards.

Also, it's always nice to find another fan of My Little Pony. It brings a smile to my face.

It's nice to find another Zoe main that's also a fan of MLP.
I've always said Zoe wasn't the aspect of Twilight, more like the aspect of Pinkie Pie.
The Jhin design is based on Tuxedo Mask isn't it...
YUP. I'd been wanting a tuxedo mask Jhin forever :)

> [{quoted}](name=Jhins Girlfriend,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AzLYfGGw,comment-id=00100000,timestamp=2018-12-23T17:59:46.732+0000)
>
> YUP. I'd been wanting a tuxedo mask Jhin forever :)

For a somewhat twisted anime in an adorable disguise...well played.
Well played indeed.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Me: "No way Jhin can be a star guardian."
Me after I clicked the post: "Damn Jhin lookin' clean af"
I like the Jhin design, that's really neat take on that.
Take my money for the Irelia skin already thanks

Tristana feels like a copy of Star Guardian Lulu. Maybe change her color scheme from green to something else? Yellow? Gray?

This is still awesome though. I love Jhin and Zoe!
I believe all the Star Guardians have the same colors; Pink, red, green, blue, and purple.

> [{quoted}](name=4 Step Cadence,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AzLYfGGw,comment-id=00150000,timestamp=2018-12-23T19:35:34.617+0000)
>
> I believe all the Star Guardians have the same colors; Pink, red, green, blue, and purple.

Oh oops. Just checked. You're right. But... I believe that the clothes and hair does not have to be same color. 

Compare SG Lulu and SG Soraka for example...

Right.

Her color could also be switched with someone else. Traditionally, I believe pink is the leader, and in my opinion Tristana would be a better leader than Zoe(even though pink suits her a lot). We also have a human leader(Lux) and a Vastaya leader(Ahri), so why not a Yordle leader?

Jhin is a 100% yes, Irelia I feel would not fit into this though its my opinion. She gives me the "relies on herself more than allies in fights" kind of vibe. Tristana and Taliyah I have seen tons of fan art for and I love the looks on these two, only difference I'd make would be maybe make Taliyah's outfit more of a reddish/ maybe add a cape. Zoe I have mixed feelings about being a Star Guardian, in ways she can be but again like Irelia I don't really see her being one. Ashe or even Xayah/Rakan would be a better choice.

Yeah that makes sense too. I'm not a huge fan of Ashe in the sense that she doesn't have a whole lot of personality. I was actually gonna do a second set with Xayah/Rakan, Nami, and Neeko, but i hadn't chosen the final yet. Might throw Ashe in the idea pool.

Even though I dislike this champion for a multitude of reasons, Leblanc could also be a good choice instead of Ashe. If you wanted another guy I have only seen 1 Star Guardian Taric that kinda looked neat.
When will you do a Star Guardian Kled riding a space dragon or something?
I really like most of these, you even used two of the champions on my dream team: {{champion:163}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:142}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:20}}

Main complaint: Why on earth is Jhin's Star Guardian Spirit flying Potstickers?!?! They should be like 4 mini bullet-like Flamenco dancers, kinda like Sex Pistols from Jojo's Bizarre Adventures Golden Wind http://jojo.wikia.com/wiki/Sex_Pistols Otherwise maybe add some details onto Jhin's mask otherwise they all look pretty good
Or white butterflies, a common theme in Jhin's performances.

White Butterflies are a good idea, even if Dumplings are his favourite food it just looks kinda funny since Jhin is a very serious character and the dumplings are just too silly for him. Maybe stylize his mask to look kinda like a butterfly then you can have little bullet bodied butterflies as his guardian spirits
That and the butterfly ideas are cute, I went with dumplings since they're apparently his favorite food and are usually served in groups of four!

the art here is great, and i love the ideas, but the real shining concept work are the ability VFXs concepts. they fit perfectly, they look professional and amazing in these screen shots. 

great job!

I actually really like the jhin one, but am like breaking my brain imagining him as a good guy.  I love all this fan art so much, very well done!  Might have given taliya the green color pallet, but thatâs pretty minor. Great work and thanks for sharing!

Personal fantasy team:
{{champion:163}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:164}} {{champion:142}}
Kind of as the older, leader group that act in place of the first star since it litterally only talks to lulu.

> [{quoted}](name=ZaneShadow,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AzLYfGGw,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2018-12-23T17:31:36.005+0000)
>
> I actually really like the jhin one, but am like breaking my brain imagining him as a good guy.  I love all this fan art so much, very well done!  Might have given taliya the green color pallet, but thatâs pretty minor. Great work and thanks for sharing!

> Personal fantasy team:
> {{champion:163}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:164}} {{champion:142}}
> Kind of as the older, leader group that act in place of the first star since it litterally only talks to lulu.

gotta say, I love the Jhin one the best, tho can't really say we should get Taric, primarily because the star guardian set has a very specific theme, it's all mages/marksmen (with the exception of poppy) and also they're champs who can easily pass off for highschool students (for the most part due to the yordle champs)

{{item:3070}} {{champion:92}} always left out
These are very nice though, and I would even use this Irelia skin over divine sword.

> [{quoted}](name=Jhins Girlfriend,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AzLYfGGw,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-12-23T02:24:08.104+0000)

> So I&#039;d never designed skins before, but I decided to a while back because I love star guardian skins so much. I had a blast doing these, hopefully y&#039;all like them!
> I see Irelia as the leader since she&#039;s kind of a freedom fighter in her lore.

Can we get some more star guardian top laners? I'm sick of trying to coordinate an all-star guardian team comp and just have it fall apart at "who should jungle? If poppy jungles, who goes top?"
Really nice job. These look so damn amazing and clean. Still, I'm asking for a star Guardian Urgot and Star Guardian Sion. Make them as pink as possible, please :D

I think the main color for SG Tristana should be changed. She may look too similar to SG Lulu (but perhaps it's fine since Trisatan has a large cannon). 

Beside that, I like them all.
jhin one needs more cape. you can never have too much cape
jhin belong in dark star not star guardian.  i can only picture zoe and taliyah on there. in addition i can picture neeko,xayah and rakan part of it.

So... Zoe would be the leader?

Current SG canon is that pinks are the leader and shes the pink.

Personally I feel like she'd fit the spiritual green more

In my own fan team Zoe is green, Kayn is blue, Taliyah is pink, Ekko is red and Kai'Sa is purple.
Downvoted solely because Zoe, fuck that lil shit

> [{quoted}](name=GlÃ®tchy,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AzLYfGGw,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-12-23T02:55:36.298+0000)
>
